segment.source: How to Install the Sequencer (App-V 4.6 SP1)
segment.target: How to Install the Sequencer (App-V 4.6 SP1)

segment.source: How to Install the Sequencer (App-V 4.6 SP1)
segment.target: How to Install the Sequencer (App-V 4.6 SP1)

segment.source: How to Install the Sequencer (App-V 4.6 SP1)
segment.target: How to Install the Sequencer (App-V 4.6 SP1)

segment.source: The Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) Sequencer monitors and records the installation and setup process for applications so that the application can be run as a virtual application.
segment.target: The Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) Sequencer monitors and records the installation and setup process for applications so that the application can be run as a virtual application.

segment.source: You should install the App-V Sequencer on a computer that has only the operating system installed.
segment.target: You should install the App-V Sequencer on a computer that has only the operating system installed.

segment.source: Alternatively, you can install the Sequencer on a computer running in a virtual environment, for example, a virtual computer.
segment.target: Alternatively, you can install the Sequencer on a computer running in a virtual environment, for example, a virtual computer.

segment.source: This method is useful because it is easier to maintain a clean sequencing environment that you can reuse with minimal additional configuration.
segment.target: This method is useful because it is easier to maintain a clean sequencing environment that you can reuse with minimal additional configuration.

segment.source: You must have administrative credentials on the computer you are using to sequence the application, and the computer must not be running any version of App-V client.
segment.target: You must have administrative credentials on the computer you are using to sequence the application, and the computer must not be running any version of App-V client.

segment.source: Creating a virtual application by using the App-V Sequencer requires multiple operations, so it is important that you install the Sequencer on a computer that meets or exceeds the Application Virtualization Sequencer Hardware and Software Requirements.
segment.target: Creating a virtual application by using the App-V Sequencer requires multiple operations, so it is important that you install the Sequencer on a computer that meets or exceeds the Application Virtualization Sequencer Hardware and Software Requirements.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: Running the App-V sequencer in Safe Mode is not supported.
segment.target: Running the App-V sequencer in Safe Mode is not supported.

segment.source: To install the Microsoft Application Virtualization Sequencer
segment.target: To install the Microsoft Application Virtualization Sequencer

segment.source: Copy the Microsoft Application Virtualization Sequencer installation files to the computer on which you want to install it.
segment.target: Copy the Microsoft Application Virtualization Sequencer installation files to the computer on which you want to install it.

segment.source: To start the Microsoft Application Virtualization Sequencer installation wizard, double-click Setup.exe.
segment.target: To start the Microsoft Application Virtualization Sequencer installation wizard, double-click Setup.exe.

segment.source: If the Microsoft Visual C++ SP1 Redistributable Package (x86) is not detected prior to installation, click Install to install the required prerequisite.
segment.target: If the Microsoft Visual C++ SP1 Redistributable Package (x86) is not detected prior to installation, click Install to install the required prerequisite.

segment.source: To continue the installation, on the Welcome page, click Next.
segment.target: To continue the installation, on the Welcome page, click Next.

segment.source: On the License Agreement page, to accept the terms of the license agreement, click I accept the terms in the license agreement, and then click Next.
segment.target: On the License Agreement page, to accept the terms of the license agreement, click I accept the terms in the license agreement, and then click Next.

segment.source: On the Destination Folder page, to accept the default installation folder, click Next.
segment.target: On the Destination Folder page, to accept the default installation folder, click Next.

segment.source: To specify a different destination folder, click Change and specify the installation folder that will be used for the installation.
segment.target: To specify a different destination folder, click Change and specify the installation folder that will be used for the installation.

segment.source: Click Next.
segment.target: Click Next.

segment.source: On the Virtual Drive page, to configure the Application Virtualization default drive Q: (default) as the drive that all sequenced applications will run from, click Next.
segment.target: On the Virtual Drive page, to configure the Application Virtualization default drive Q: (default) as the drive that all sequenced applications will run from, click Next.

segment.source: If you want to specify a different drive letter, use the list and select the drive letter that you want to use by selecting the appropriate drive letter, and then click Next.
segment.target: If you want to specify a different drive letter, use the list and select the drive letter that you want to use by selecting the appropriate drive letter, and then click Next.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: The Application Virtualization drive letter specified with this step is the drive letter that virtual applications will be run from on target computers.
segment.target: The Application Virtualization drive letter specified with this step is the drive letter that virtual applications will be run from on target computers.

segment.source: The drive letter specified must be available, and not currently in use on the computers running the App-V client.
segment.target: The drive letter specified must be available, and not currently in use on the computers running the App-V client.

segment.source: If the specified drive is already in use, the virtual application fails on the target computer.
segment.target: If the specified drive is already in use, the virtual application fails on the target computer.

segment.source: On the Ready to Install the Program page, to start the installation, click Install.
segment.target: On the Ready to Install the Program page, to start the installation, click Install.

segment.source: On the InstallShield Wizard Completed page, to close the installation wizard and open the App-V Sequencer, click Finish.
segment.target: On the InstallShield Wizard Completed page, to close the installation wizard and open the App-V Sequencer, click Finish.

segment.source: To close the installation wizard without opening the Sequencer, clear Launch the program, and then click Finish.
segment.target: To close the installation wizard without opening the Sequencer, clear Launch the program, and then click Finish.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: If you installed the App-V Sequencer on a computer running a virtual environment, for example a virtual machine, you must now take a snapshot.
segment.target: If you installed the App-V Sequencer on a computer running a virtual environment, for example a virtual machine, you must now take a snapshot.

segment.source: After you sequence an application, you can revert to this image, so you can sequence the next application.
segment.target: After you sequence an application, you can revert to this image, so you can sequence the next application.

segment.source: When you uninstall the Sequencer, the following registry keys are not removed from the computer that the Sequencer was installed on.
segment.target: When you uninstall the Sequencer, the following registry keys are not removed from the computer that the Sequencer was installed on.

segment.source: Additionally, you must restart the computer after you have uninstalled the Sequencer so that all associated drivers can be stopped and the operation can be completed.
segment.target: Additionally, you must restart the computer after you have uninstalled the Sequencer so that all associated drivers can be stopped and the operation can be completed.
